name: Bug Battle
description: Bug Battle Game is a simple top down shooter game. Players shoot at animated bugs that are spawned by a boss crawling on top of the screen. Once a specific amount of baby bugs are killed, the player is then able to damage the boss bug and level up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Proccessor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 568 MB available space
